allow(address).details: This must be called before `depositRewardToken` can be called successfully

params._rewardToken: address of the reward token to deposit

depositRewardToken(address).details: Upon calling this function, the reward token will be transferred from this contract to the gauge.

params._rewardToken: address of the reward token to deposit

allow(address).notice: Allow the gauge to use the reward token in this contract

constructor.notice: RewardForwarder constructor. Sets the gauge address.
